title: Juliana’s workshop - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Fantasy   Josei   Mature   Psychological   Supernatural
tags: Alchemy   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Knights   Leadership   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Medieval   Monsters   Multiple POV   Religions   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Witches   Wizards   World Travel
author: Wind’s Too Cold   风太冷了
description:
Hello there dear customer, here is Juliana’s workshop, may I ask what do you need? The choice of goods here is for you gentlemen to pick, they have reasonable prices and I won’t deceive either youngsters or old folks. If you need a customized product and have the patience, I will also offer it to you with both hands as soon as possible.

Oh? Do you want something a bit more special?

That would be even better.

The humble me, Juliana, is an alchemist who can make everything you can and can’t imagine…

And I also love a career that is refining heroes, overlords, queens, saints, devils…

What kind of person do you want to be then, dear customer?

This’s the story of a perverted old woman who has no love.>
